chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Dave's behavior is extremely suspicious - he tried to cast doubt on Alice's silence right before her body was found, and he was one of the last people near her in the cafeteria.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: The three of you keep coordinating your stories about Alice moving between tasks, but I was genuinely in Weapons when this happened, and your synchronized accusations against me seem very orchestrated.
